about_the_game:
Experience fast-paced shotgun carnage in this mini-roguelite boomer shooter like no other! Fight through over 70 procedurally linked combat arenas, upgrade your fighting abilities and destroy an ever increasing amount of enemy types!

Fortune has finally favoured you, and now a metal army stand between you and freedom. Can you take them on, find your way out and taste fresh air again? If you look close enough, you may even discover darker secrets, and stumble into something bigger then yourself.

  • Over 100 procedurally linked combat arenas to fight through, with more on the way with every update

  • Upgrade your gear and optimise your build to bring maximum carnage

  • Test your skills against over 15 enemy types, with even more added as the game evolves over time

  • Focus your build to make the best of what you're given, from high damage to chaining combos

  • A shotgun capable of unlimited ammo, just remember to keep it loaded. No need to conserve shells, get blasting!

  • An early 2000s aesthetic that blends simple, colourful and grunge in a way only the olden days could

  • Procedural generation, hand curated; designed arenas are linked by the game director, tailored to your progress and skills

  • A wealth of secrets that will test your code breaking skills and challenge you to put together the true story of the world around you. They could be hidden anywhere, even right here. Nowhere is off limits!

  • Small in size, large in scale: designed to be small in file size, but offer tons of content; with millions of possible layouts, no two playthroughs will ever be the same

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios using weapons to shoot, blow up or destroy robotic and human enemies.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 5.11
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 (2GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Breakout

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 (2GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Atos criminosos

short_description: Experience fast-paced shotgun carnage in this mini-roguelite boomer shooter like no other! Explore over 70 procedurally linked combat arenas as a metal army hellbent on destruction stand between you and freedom. Are you ready to take them on?
